notice.ch: 先修物理冶金或材料導論

remark.ch: 先修物理冶金或材料導論

goal.ch: “金屬熱處理主要之講授內容涵蓋有鐵基及非鐵基金屬材料於熱處理過程之基本相變化。同時也為每組同學設計一實作之實驗，讓同學進一步了解各種合金於熱處理製程之強化機制。學生可學習到如何利用金屬材料本質之各種相變化機構來調整材料之最適用性質，並藉由專題實驗之操作以熟悉熱處理之實務經驗，奠定未來就業或進修研究之基礎。“
goal.en: “The content of heat treatment of metals includes the phase transformation during heat treating for the ferrous and non-ferrous metallic materials. Meanwhile, each group student needs to finish one assigned experiment for understanding the strengthening mechanism of heat treatment. Via the lecture and experiment practice, students will learn how to use a proper heat treatment to modify the mechanical properties of metallic material for their specific purpose.“

outline.ch: “授課內容包含課程講授及專題實作訓練:(A)課程講授:I. Tools for Metallurgical Characterization (冶金分析之工具)II. Fe-C Phase Diagram (?碳相平衡圖)III. Phase and structures (相與組織)IV. Phase transformation in the Fe-C system (?碳相平衡圖中之相變化)V. TTT and CCT curves (恆溫變態與連續冷卻變態圖)VI. Heat treatment to produce Ferrite and Pearlite (產生肥粒鐵和波來鐵之熱處理)VII. Quenching and Tempering (淬火與回火)VIII. Thermo-mechanical treatment and Sub-zero treatment (熱機處理與深冷處理)IX. Metallograph of Steel (鋼之金相)X. Surface Hardening (表面硬化)XI. Precipitation Hardening (析出硬化)XII. Heat treatment of Stainless Steel (不銹鋼之熱處理)XIII. Heat treatment of steel wire and strip (鋼線與鋼片之熱處理)XIV. Heat treatment of non-ferrous alloys (非鐵合金之熱處理)(B) 專題實作訓練:以每5~7人一組, 而分別給每組設計一不同的材料熱處理製程, 要求每組同學分工完成其設定之專題實驗, 並撰寫成書面報告及在課堂上口頭報告.“
outline.en: “(A)Lectures:I. Tools for Metallurgical Characterization II. Fe-C Phase Diagram III. Phase and structures IV. Phase transformation in the Fe-C system V. TTT and CCT curves VI. Heat treatment to produce Ferrite and Pearlite VII. Quenching and Tempering VIII. Thermo-mechanical treatment and Sub-zero treatment IX. Metallograph of Steel X. Surface Hardening XI. Precipitation HardeningXII. Heat treatment of Stainless Steel XIII. Heat treatment of steel wire and strip XIV. Heat treatment of non-ferrous alloys (B) Assigned experiment:Each group contains 5~7 students, each group will be assigned one different metallic alloy and heat tratment process. Each group has to give an oral presentation and one written report at the last week of the semester.“

textbook.ch: “1.熱處理學, 金重勳著,復文書局出版2.Principles of Heat Treatment of Steel, ed. by George Krauss, American Society for Metals, 1980.3.Heat Treatment, Structure and Properties of Non-ferrous Alloys, American Society for Metals, 1982.4.ASM Handbook Vol. 4 “Heat Treatment”, ASM International, 1991. 5.Hand out“
textbook.en: “1.熱處理學, 金重勳著,復文書局出版2.Principles of Heat Treatment of Steel, ed. by George Krauss, American Society for Metals, 1980.3.Heat Treatment, Structure and Properties of Non-ferrous Alloys, American Society for Metals, 1982.4.ASM Handbook Vol. 4 “Heat Treatment”, ASM International, 1991. 5.Hand out“

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討
實習/實驗

gradMethod.ch: “專題閱讀心得及口頭書面報告15％,專題實驗書面報告25％,專題實驗口頭發表30％,期末筆試30％“
gradMethod.en:
“Assigned reading report and presentation 15％
Written report of assigned experiment 25％
Oral presentation of assigned experiment 30％
Final examination 30％“

flexDiscription.ch: 期末兩週供專題實作口頭報告
flexDiscription.en: The last two weeks provide for the oral presentation of assigned experiment.

en.competencies: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation
